description:
Conan, Ran, and Kogoro come to test venture company Oshiro`s newly developed frying pan. Employees Taguchi and Tomi finish their presentation and call in President Omura to greet their guests, but he doesn`t show up. Conan and Kogoro run to the president`s office when they hear a scream, where they find Omura bleeding from the chest. Meanwhile, there is an explosion in the research wing of the office, and R&D Head Koshiro`s body is discovered...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La poêle à frire de la haine
